title: I can't install League of Legends.
body:
When I download and run League of Legends installer, at the end I click install but it say:
File does not exist: C:/Users/User/AppData/Roaming/Riot Games/League of Legends 4.2.1/install/LoL.EUNE.msi.

But it's my first time installing League of Legends on this computer..

replies.body: Double-check that you're running the installer as admin. If not right click on the installer and choose the 'Run as Administrator' option and you should be able to get that installer to finish up.
I tried that, it doesn't work.

No worries, we've got a handy alternate installer which should work a little better for you. Check out this [**download**](https://1drv.ms/u/s!Arzi9chuskhMbGmjd7C4M0AoO9k) instead, and let me know if that one still won't work! Make sure to follow these steps after grabbing that file:

1. Download Alternate_Installer.zip
2. Open Alternate_Installer.zip
3. Open C:\
4. Drag & drop "Riot Games" folder into C:\
5. Go to the "League of Legends" folder
6. For easier access, Right-click LeagueClient.exe (do one or more of the following):
  - Create shortcut and drag & drop it to Desktop.
  - Pin to Taskbar
  - Pin to Start Menu
7. Double-click LeagueClient.exe.
